text: Everyone who can wiggle their ears.
Everyone who can touch their nose with their tongue.
Everyone who can make a clover shape with their tongue.
Everyone who can recite the alphabet backwards quickly.
Everyone who can do a really good impression of a celebrity or cartoon character.
Everyone who can solve a Rubik's Cube.
Everyone who can remember an impressive amount of song lyrics.
Everyone who can fold a fitted sheet perfectly.
Everyone who has a 'useless' party trick they're proud of.
